synopsis.text: Over whelmed by the unexpected transformation of his slime creation, Kotarou, a middle school student, finds himself in a whirlwind of excitement and confusion! The slime, Puniru, has morphed into a stunningly beautiful girl, turning their ordinary friendship into an extraordinary adventure. For seven years, Kotarou has enjoyed the company of Puniru, who effortlessly changes into adorable forms and exhibits free-spirited behavior. As they navigate through challenging days ahead, Kotarou struggles to keep up with Puniru's antics, leaving him constantly bewildered yet entertained. Will their unique bond withstand the test of time, or will the complexities of their new reality bring an end to their friendship? Join Kotarou and Puniru in this delightful and thrilling journey, as they explore the true meaning of friendship.
